description.en-US:
From Mozilla non-browser applications, FileBugReport opens a new bug report page for the appropriate product and fills the build-identifier field.  Benefits:

 • Testers reporting bugs will appreciate not having to (remember to) find the build-identifier and then cut and paste it into the report.
 • Triagers confirming bugs will appreciate receiving reports with the correct product and build-identifier for the buggy system, making it easier to reproduce the problem.

After successful installation and application restart:

 • Thunderbird: The Tools menu now contains "File Thunderbird Bug Report". Invoking it opens your browser at the Mozilla Bugzilla site, on the Thunderbird guided enter-bug page, with the build-id field filled with Thunderbird's navigator.userAgent string.

 • Thunderbird: The Tools menu now contains "File Lightning Bug Report".  Invoking it opens your browser at the Mozilla Bugzilla site, on the Calendar guided enter-bug page, with the build-id field filled with Thunderbird's navigator.userAgent string.

 • Sunbird: The Tools menu now contains "File Sunbird Bug Report".  Invoking it opens your browser at the Mozilla Bugzilla site, on the Calendar guided enter-bug page, with the build-id field filled with Sunbird's navigator.userAgent string.

As always, be sure to search previous bug reports for the problem you've discovered before deciding to file a new bug report on that problem.  It may save you the time it will take to write up a detailed report on how to reproduce the problem, and save you the disappointment of having your report marked 'duplicate'.

developer_comments.en-US:
Known issues:

File Lightning Bug Report appears in Thunderbird even if Lightning is not installed.  If it bothers you, you can try hiding it by adding the following to chrome/userChrome.css in your profile directory:
  #FileBugReport-Lightning-file-report-item { display: none; }  
   
This extension does not install into Firefox.  Browsers like Firefox do not need this extension because the enter-bug web page can continue to fill the build-id field using the userAgent string from the browser.

References:
bug 308943 Remove auto-fill build-id for non-browser products
bug 308950 Add build-id URL parameter to guided enter-bug page

Changes:
0.4 20090412 Added sunbird.jar to manifest for Sunbird 1.0pre
0.3 20080927 Added changed Tools menu id for Sunbird 0.9
0.2 20061209 Added separate Lightning menu item
0.1 20050927 Initial

caption.en-US: In Thunderbird, "File Thunderbird Bug Report" opens the Bugzilla guided "Enter a bug" page for product "Thunderbird", with the build id field filled.
In Thunderbird, "File Lightning Bug Report" opens the Bugzilla guided "Enter a bug" page for product "Calendar", with the build id field filled.
In Sunbird, "File Sunbird Bug Report" opens the Bugzilla guided "Enter a bug" page for product "Calendar", with the build id field filled.

summary.en-US: For testers and developers who submit bug reports:   Adds "File Bug Report" command to Tools menu.  Opens browser at the Bugzilla enter-bug page in guided format with product and build identifier.
